org.team5940.pantry.processing_network.functional.comparison

Class ChangeDetectorValueNode<T,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.team5940.pantry.processing_network.Node
      • org.team5940.pantry.processing_network.ValueNode<V>
        • org.team5940.pantry.processing_network.functional.comparison.ChangeDetectorValueNode<T,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of value the change ValueNode returns.
    V - The type of value this ValueNode returns.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.team5940.pantry.logging.LabeledObject

    public abstract class ChangeDetectorValueNode<T,V>
extends ValueNode<V>
    This detects when the value of a ValueNode is changed. When the value is changed this runs valueChanged with the new value as the argument. This uses .equals to see if the value has changed. It will run when on the initial value of the Node is returned. IMPORTANT. This should not be used to edit variables but only other nodes. IMPORTANT

        This detects when a ValueNode value changes. It runs valueChanged when it has changed with the new value.

    • Method Detail

      • doUpdate

        protected void doUpdate()
        Description copied from class: ValueNode
        Runs updateValue() and caches what it returns even if it is null. Also logs it. Internal method for performing the node's update. It can only be called 0 or 1 time(s) per Network cycle.
        Overrides:
        doUpdate in class ValueNode<V>

      • valueChanged

        protected abstract void valueChanged(T newValue)
        Run when the value of the ValueNode has changed. This is run before doUpdate() is run so what this edits will be activated for the latest cycle.
        Parameters:
        newValue - The new value of the ValueNode.
